issue.title: [R] skip arrow_binary/arrow_large_binary class from R metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14140](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14140). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The classes `c("arrow_binary", "vctrs_vctr", "list")` and `c("arrow_large_binary", "vctrs_vctr", "list")` should be removed in `arrow_attributes()`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14140?focusedCommentId=17421363) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11240
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11240>
